typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		country as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		station as string,
		last_update as timestamp,
		pollutant_id as string,
		pollutant_min as string,
		pollutant_max as string,
		pollutant_avg as string,
		pollutant_unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MergedPollutionFiles
MergedPollutionFiles aggregate(groupBy(station),
	Avg_pollution_min = avg(toInteger(pollutant_min)),
		Avg_pollution_avg = avg(toInteger(pollutant_avg)),
		Avg_pollution_max = avg(toInteger(pollutant_max))) ~> AggregatePollutionData
AggregatePollutionData sink(input(
		id as string,
		country as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		station as string,
		last_update as string,
		pollutant_id as string,
		pollutant_min as string,
		pollutant_max as string,
		pollutant_avg as string,
		pollutant_unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AggregatedPollutionDataFile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PollutionAggregatedDataSink
